Package com.toropov.oleg.world

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Actions
    The Actions class manages the simulation actions, including starting, pausing, resuming, and stopping the simulation.
    Simulation
    The Simulation class manages the entire lifecycle of the simulation, including initializing the map, starting, pausing, and stopping the simulation, and updating the UI.
    SimulationUI
    The SimulationUI class manages the user interface for the simulation.
